svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
April 23, 2017" date: "2017-04-23"
News and Links
Top
* Gnosis raised $12.5m USD in Ether in 11 minutes. For months I’ve said we’d view token
sales as Pre-Gnosis and Post-Gnosis . Needless to say, I expect more reverse Dutch
auctions. I bet ivvv7777777 it wouldn’t sell out in the first 24 hours, but it didn’t
even last 24 minutes! High profile sales and attractive valuations should result in
more entrepreneurs who are interested in raising capital by selling tokens.
Gnosis raised $12.5m USD in Ether in 11 minutes.
* For months I’ve said we’d view token sales as Pre-Gnosis and Post-Gnosis . Needless
to say, I expect more reverse Dutch auctions. I bet ivvv7777777 it wouldn’t sell out
in the first 24 hours, but it didn’t even last 24 minutes!
For months I’ve said we’d view token sales as Pre-Gnosis and Post-Gnosis . Needless to
say, I expect more reverse Dutch auctions. I bet ivvv7777777 it wouldn’t sell out in
the first 24 hours, but it didn’t even last 24 minutes!
* High profile sales and attractive valuations should result in more entrepreneurs who
are interested in raising capital by selling tokens.
High profile sales and attractive valuations should result in more entrepreneurs who
* Coinbase released Token beta, a mobile Ethereum messenger/wallet/browser similar to
Status , somewhat more centralized (eg uses Signal instead of Whisper) This fits
perfectly with the Coinbase Master Plan that Brian Armstrong announced last year
Coinbase released Token beta, a mobile Ethereum messenger/wallet/browser similar to
Status , somewhat more centralized (eg uses Signal instead of Whisper)
* This fits perfectly with the Coinbase Master Plan that Brian Armstrong announced last
year
* Rice Blockchain conference was a huge success. Fantastic job by Tyler Smith
organizing the conference. Lots of standout talks, but as a Houstonian, Tyler’s talk on
“beyond supply chains” in oil and gas was fascinating. Also impressive to see how many
massive energy companies have people excited about using blockchains to solve problems.
RELATED: ConsenSys hires BHP Billiton blockchain and energy expert Dr Tyler Smith
Rice Blockchain conference was a huge success. Fantastic job by Tyler Smith organizing
the conference. Lots of standout talks, but as a Houstonian, Tyler’s talk on “beyond
supply chains” in oil and gas was fascinating.
* Also impressive to see how many massive energy companies have people excited about
using blockchains to solve problems.
* RELATED: ConsenSys hires BHP Billiton blockchain and energy expert Dr Tyler Smith
Protocol and Geth release
* Video of April 21 core dev meeting Metropolis still targeted at end of June
Video of April 21 core dev meeting
* Metropolis still targeted at end of June
* Example code for quantum-resistant hash-based signatures
Example code for quantum-resistant hash-based signatures
Stuff for developers
* EthRaspbian and EthArmbian images update Geth light client on Onion Omega2 MIPS(le)
EthRaspbian and EthArmbian images update
* Geth light client on Onion Omega2 MIPS(le)
* Make sure you’re doing math right. " If you math wrong in Ethereum, you can lose
money “
Make sure you’re doing math right. " If you math wrong in Ethereum, you can lose money
* Dapphub introduces DS-Math
Dapphub introduces DS-Math
* Ethereum.RB 2.1 released
Ethereum.RB 2.1 released
* Want to help CodeWars support Solidity ?
Want to help CodeWars support Solidity ?
* Zeppelin now does key management and escrow services Not surprisingly, Zeppelin is
also hiring
Zeppelin now does key management and escrow services
* Not surprisingly, Zeppelin is also hiring
Ecosystem
* Wall Street Journal discusses ConsenSys/Hyperledger work in Dubai
* Asia’s Rising Scientists profile of Loi Luu . I’m thinking we’ll have a pickup
soccer game at DevCon3?
* Streamr and Ethereum : How a data feed platform saw the light
* Short video clip of Vitalik speaking Mandarin on Chinese TV
* Melonport: Difference Between Protocol Tokens and Traditional Asset Tokens
* Weipoint: an Ethereum search engine
Interviews
* BlockChannel interviews John Lilic of ConsenSys
Project Updates
* Legendary game developer Jez San unveils real-time gaming platform . Watch . Ethereum
makes possible game ideas he had 35 years ago .
Legendary game developer Jez San unveils real-time gaming platform . Watch .
* Ethereum makes possible game ideas he had 35 years ago .
* Status 0.9.6 (Alpha) Release - UI Refresh. Now using Whisper v5
Status 0.9.6 (Alpha) Release - UI Refresh. Now using Whisper v5
* Encoding the Status ‘Genesis Block’
Encoding the Status ‘Genesis Block’
* Latest issue of The Etherian : Updates on All Your Favorite Dapps
Latest issue of The Etherian : Updates on All Your Favorite Dapps
* Spotify buys Mediachain
Spotify buys Mediachain
Token Sales
* Brave’s Basic Attention Token will raise 15 million USD in the first half of May.
Video of Jordan Leigh breaking down the white paper
Brave’s Basic Attention Token will raise 15 million USD in the first half of May.
* Video of Jordan Leigh breaking down the white paper
* Storj announces token sale
Storj announces token sale
* An introduction to TokenCard
An introduction to TokenCard
* Aragon development plan Technical overview of their token sale
Aragon development plan
* Technical overview of their token sale
General
* If you watch HBO’s Silicon Valley, the season opener rotundly confirmed that season 4
is about Ethereum Maybe that’s why Ethereum is even cracking Hacker News , a place with
a reputation for Bitcoin maximalism
If you watch HBO’s Silicon Valley, the season opener rotundly confirmed that season 4
is about Ethereum
* Maybe that’s why Ethereum is even cracking Hacker News , a place with a reputation
for Bitcoin maximalism
* Former hedge funder Mike Novogratz has 10% of his net worth in btc and ether . Good
story aside, this is the real reason Vitalik was late to meet him. Vice profiles
Vitalik . Plus a profile of Dmitry Buterin
Former hedge funder Mike Novogratz has 10% of his net worth in btc and ether .
* Good story aside, this is the real reason Vitalik was late to meet him.
Good story aside, this is the real reason Vitalik was late to meet him.
* Vice profiles Vitalik . Plus a profile of Dmitry Buterin
Vice profiles Vitalik . Plus a profile of Dmitry Buterin
* Mougayar: Regulators should view crypto as a new asset class
Mougayar: Regulators should view crypto as a new asset class
* My friend Cory is putting together a Devcon3 house in Cancun from Oct 15 - Nov 15.
[Disclosure: I think he’s paying me a referral fee]
My friend Cory is putting together a Devcon3 house in Cancun from Oct 15 - Nov 15.
Dates of note
[For ongoing sales, check previous week ]
* April 25 – Sikoba public pre-sale begins.However, a pre-allocation is already open
* May 2 – TokenCard sale begins
* May 2 – E4ROW sale begins
* May 10 – Boscoin sale begins
* May 17 – Aragon sale begins
* May 19 – Storj sale begins
* May 19 – ConsenSys Ethereal Summit in Brooklyn – I’ll be there
* May 25 - William Mougayar’s Token Summit at NYU
* May 30 – Bancor Network sale begins
* June 1 – Mysterium sale begins
Bias transparency : if you host a blockchain conference and don’t use Ticketleap , I’m
much less likely to include your conference, unless you have a good reason as to why
we’re not a good fit. But I doubt there is one, because we’re likely a great fit.
/shamelessplug
[I aim for a relatively comprehensive list of Ethereum sales, but make no warranty as
to even whether they are legit; as such, I thus likewise warrant nothing about whether
any will produce a satisfactory return. I have passed the CFA exams , but this is not
investment advice. If you’re interested in what I do, you can find my investing thesis
and token sale appreciation strategies in previous newsletters.]
The link for sharing
Also, you can follow me on Twitter @evan_van_ness
This newsletter is supported by Status.im . But in case you still want to send Ether
(or tokens?): 0x96d4F0E75ae86e4c46cD8e9D4AE2F2309bD6Ec45
Week in Ethereum News
